title: Is there a philosophy about philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: If considering each one of us that make conversation is making philosophy then we can consider that there is a philosophy about philosophy because after all one philosopher is a Man and we all are mens and so if some make philosophy and do it by conversation so as we all converse so we are all making that there is a philosophy about philosophy.

A system of reason could be such a philosophy. Hegel’s system incorporates this claim. However, most philosophers judge other philosophers entailing a standpoint that there is a philosophy about philosophy.
